DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: State ' s Exports Up Only 2 % in 1993 : State commerce officials said the slight increase was because of a huge decline in aircraft and aerospace products and a slump in European markets.The export of transportation equipment , which includes aircraft and aerospace items , fell 28.7 % . If that is not included , state exports grew by 8.4 % . Total worldwide exports of California goods were $ 70.3 billion . That total does not include legal and financial services , construction , movies , recordings , software and foreign tourism , which would increase the figure by $ 30 billion .
